Title: The Book of Kevin
Writer: Damon Lindelof, Patrick Somerville, Damon Lindelof (created by), Tom Perrotta (created by), Tom Perrotta (based on the book by)
Actors: Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Liv Tyler
Plot: Three years have passed since the GR invaded Miracle. Kevin works as a cop again. Rumors rise that the seventh anniversary of the Sudden Departure will bring an apocalyptic catastrophe.
